actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6+2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The worg has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.
